segments.text: What the ruffian boss said, after turning around and pressing the red button,

critique:
1. This is a 2D video without a parallax effect, so “move up” is incorrect — use “scroll up” instead.
2. After the ruffian boss finishes speaking, he turns around and presses the red button

captions.single: What the ruffian boss said, after turning around and pressing the red button, the camera moves up, Brother Octopus looks up at the moving lines within the machine, while the other creatures behind him are eating, their bodies slightly moving.
